p: ALX-0171 is a trimeric domain Nanobody based-drug that binds the antigenic site II of RSV F protein. ALX-0171 completely inhibited replication under detection rate. The function of ALX-0171 in virus titer removal from nasal and lung is more effective than palivizumab, a humanized monoclonal antibody [70]. Development of VHH based-drug against human immunodeficiency virus-1 (HIV-1) [71], influenza viruses [72], hepatitis C virus (HCV) [73] are ongoing.
